Docs.summary: Defines identifiers that indicate the persistence scope of a tab in the Properties window.

remarks.format:
## Remarks PropertyTabScope indicates the persistence scope of a tab that is displayed in the Properties window when a component of a design document has an associated <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyTabAttribute>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use PropertyTabScope to specify the scope of a property tab.
